You have re-organized and vassalized the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] of the historical Roman province under your command. May their mighty power help you fight off the barbarians !
Without the authority of a Roman liege controlling their historical province, the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has lost its roots and was forced to disbanded.
One day I shall reconquer these lands...
Fine, I had no use for that Roman legacy.
